bibl.title: Receipt from the Royal Society of Tropical Medicine and Hygiene to Henry Rose Carter, May 10, 1921

div1.p: Receipt for Carter's Royal Society of Tropical Medicine and Hygiene subscription.

div1.head: Receipt from the Royal Society of Tropical Medicine and Hygiene to Henry Rose Carter, May 10, 1921
div1.opener:
No. 71
The Royal Society of Tropical Medicine and Hygiene,
10th May 1921.
div1.p:
Received of Dr. H. R. Carter Junior.
the sum of One GuineaPound 11/6 being
Subscription for the year ending March 31, 1922
div1.closer:
With compliments and thanks. Andrew Balfour pp RD
TREASURER. £1=11=6
